ComicInfo.Summary:
Taken in and trained by her uncle to be a freedom fighter after her parents were murdered, Cassidy O'Hara leads a dual life in the mountains and forests of Manchuria. Part time guerilla, part time saloon girl, Cassidy is about to be pulled into a plot that will affect the outcome of the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor, and the very outcome of World War II.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Billy Tucci & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Anthony Spay & Ula Mos | 2 | C | Cover C | Pasquale Qualano & Ylenia di Napoli | 3 | D | Cover D | Franchesco! | 4 | RE | Retailer Exclusive "Vintage" Cover E, Limited to 500 | Franchesco! | 5 | Digital | Digital Cover | Billy Tucci & Ivan Nunes | 6 |
